channel.title: jira.namics.com
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5691] SEO - URL Migration Issues - After DE Rollout Corrections
item.description:
1) Observations :

  • After the DE rollout some remaining url pattern are not redirected correctly
  • Those pattern could only be discover after the rollout
  • Those url mainly finish into a 404

2) Impacts :

  • Not redirecting all the url result into a loss of transmission of the seo potential of the old website to the new one.
  • The impact is direct on the seo ranking inside serps, and then on the traffic.

3) Demands :

  • Redirect in 301 :
    • 1) *.distrelec.xx/ishopWebFront/xmlCatalog/node.do/para/groupId/is/* =301> http://www.distrelec.xx/
      exemple :https:/www.distrelec.de/ishopWebFront/xmlCatalog/node.do/para/groupId/is/HM-RP1245.html?utm_source=KPLUS_DE&utm_medium=kplus&utm_campaign=kplus_HM
      status : NOK
    • 2) *.distrelec.xx/ishopWebFront/catalog/sitemap.do`* =301> http://www.distrelec.xx/
      exemple :https:/www.distrelec.de/ishopWebFront/catalog/sitemap.do?catalog=01&node=DC-25309
      status : NOK
    • 3) *.distrelec.xx/ishop/CatalogPlusData/* =301> http://www.distrelec.xx/
      exemple : https:/www.distrelec.de/ishop/CatalogPlusData/DE_1.3_107_107_Befestigungsbinder_mit_Schweissbolzenaufnahme_am_Kopf.pdf
      status : NOK
    • 4) *.distrelec.xx/ishopWebFront/product/technicalRequest.do* =301> http://www.distrelec.xx/
      exemple : https:/www.distrelec.de/ishopWebFront/product/technicalRequest.do?id=01&series=1&node=DC-71560&dispatch=showForm&path=
      status : NOK
    • 5) *.distrelec.xx/ishopWebFront/product/direct.do* =301> http://www.distrelec.xx/
      exemple : https:/www.distrelec.de/ishopWebFront/product/direct.do?&nr=950631
      status : NOK
    • 6) *.distrelec.xx/ishopWebFront/search/luceneSearch.do* =301> http://www.distrelec.xx/
      exemple : https:/www.distrelec.de/ishopWebFront/search/luceneSearch.do?dispatch=show&compare=false&artnrPhrase=955045%20OR%20955055%20OR%20955047
      status : NOK
    • 7) *.distrelec.xx/ishopWebFront/search/luceneSearchCatPlus.do* =301> http://www.distrelec.xx/
      exemple : https:/www.distrelec.de/ishopWebFront/search/luceneSearchCatPlus.do?noImages=true&dispatch=goTo&filterPhrase=&pageSize=28&filterVendor=&pageNum=3418
      status : NOK
    • 9) *.distrelec.xx/*/search =301> http://www.distrelec.xx/
      exemple : https:/www.distrelec.de/random-old-category-not-inside-migration-static-file/search
      status : NOK

All those new rules must be executed as a last fallback at the very end of the htacess.

(the list will be updated along the discovery)

4) Checking process :

  • This migration issue can't be closed without my final live check.
  • Thank you to update the status of the implementation in the comment below.
item.summary: SEO - URL Migration Issues - After DE Rollout Corrections

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi Pierre
i've implemented all the rules except the last two.
Here my notes:

– *.distrelec.xx/ishopWebFront/product/direct.do* =301> http://www.distrelec.xx/
exemple : https:/www.distrelec.de/ishopWebFront/product/direct.do?&nr=950631
status : Do you think we can redirect to =301> http://www.distrelec.xx/p/{product_code}?

– *.distrelec.xx/ishopWebFront/product/technicalRequest.do* =301> http://www.distrelec.xx/
exemple : https:/www.distrelec.de/ishopWebFront/product/technicalRequest.do?id=02&series=1&node=DD-1839&dispatch=showForm&path=
Notes: Duplicate. See number 4

– *.distrelec.xx/*/search =301> http://www.distrelec.xx/
exemple : https:/www.distrelec.de/random-old-category-not-inside-migration-static-file/search
Notes: This rule is not possible because the pattern /**/search is an active pattern in the current webshop

• 5) .distrelec.xx/ishopWebFront/product/direct.do =301> http://www.distrelec.xx/
    exemple : https:/www.distrelec.de/ishopWebFront/product/direct.do?&nr=950631
    status : Do you think we can redirect to =301> http://www.distrelec.xx/p/ {product_code}

    => Good Call, let's do that !

  • 8) .distrelec.xx/ishopWebFront/product/technicalRequest.do =301> http://www.distrelec.xx/
    exemple : https:/www.distrelec.de/ishopWebFront/product/technicalRequest.do?id=02&series=1&node=DD-1839&dispatch=showForm&path=
    Notes: Duplicate. See number 4
    => Ok, I remove it
  • 9) .distrelec.xx//search =301> http://www.distrelec.xx/
    exemple : https:/www.distrelec.de/random-old-category-not-inside-migration-static-file/search
    Notes: This rule is not possible because the pattern /**/search is an active pattern in the current webshop
    => Yes like this : */search$ =301> homepage

Point 9 is dangerous. i will not implement it.
At the moment the url: https:/www.distrelec.de/random-old-category-not-inside-migration-static-file/search is returning an HTTP 200 and inform the customer that the search hasn't produced any result.

Other rules are ok.
I've manually copied the rules in quality, so you can immediately test.

Ok, thx !

9 - Why is it dangerous ?
Can you explain which side effect you see in this rule if their is a regex matching only url finishing by "/search" ?
(I did the test on user logs, their is no match of other urls than the one searched on hybris...)

test on Q :
1) https:/test.distrelec.de/ishopWebFront/xmlCatalog/node.do/para/groupId/is/HM-RP1245.html?utm_source=KPLUS_DE&utm_medium=kplus&utm_campaign=kplus_HM
OK

2) https:/test.distrelec.de/ishopWebFront/catalog/sitemap.do?catalog=01&node=DC-25309
OK

3) https:/test.distrelec.de/ishop/CatalogPlusData/DE_1.3_107_107_Befestigungsbinder_mit_Schweissbolzenaufnahme_am_Kopf.pdf
OK

4) https:/test.distrelec.de/ishopWebFront/product/technicalRequest.do?id=01&series=1&node=DC-71560&dispatch=showForm&path=
OK

5) https:/test.distrelec.de/ishopWebFront/product/direct.do?&nr=950631
OK

6) https:/test.distrelec.de/ishopWebFront/search/luceneSearch.do?dispatch=show&compare=false&artnrPhrase=955045%20OR%20955055%20OR%20955047
OK

7) https://test.distrelec.de/ishopWebFront/search/luceneSearchCatPlus.do?noImages=true&dispatch=goTo&filterPhrase=&pageSize=28&filterVendor=&pageNum=3418
NOK (404)

9) https://test.distrelec.de/random-old-category-not-inside-migration-static-file/search
NOK (0 resutls)

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4990] Eastern Countries // Create HU, CZ, SK, RO publications
item.description: please create the Q and P enviroments
item.summary: Eastern Countries // Create HU, CZ, SK, RO publications

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: I added the configurations for these countries. The corresponding webshops should be available when the v3.1 is live on Q (and P).
The sites of these countries will be available as soon as we deploy the v3.1 on either Atos-Q or HP-Q.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4799] Product Detail Page // Replace Accordion by Tabs
item.description:
D.02.02 - The technical data, distributed to multiple tables / columns increase the effort when scanning enormously.

Use design carefully to create an overview of the displayed product information. Visually group items that belong together.

Multiple changes are in the pipeline

Phase 1:

Modification of Accordion into a tabs element
4 Tabs
Content corresponds to content of former accordion
First tab contains product information and technical details, slight redesign according to design below

https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/911-5+Redesign+Product+Detail+Page
item.summary: Product Detail Page // Replace Accordion by Tabs

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Petra, please also remove the anchor links, as per ticket DISTRELEC-4798
Jan, please review. Please note, that in agreement with Nando/Florian the font-weight of label-elements remains bold and the font-weight of description-texts remains normal (unlike attached design).

Review Done

Can be tested after next deployment.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4798] Product Detail Page: Remove anchor links from top right
item.description:
D.02.01 - Anchor links in the upper right area confuse the user more than they make sense.

Solution:
Remove the anchor links and provide more space for the title of the product. Instead provide an easy overview of the sub divisions below, for example via tabs.
item.summary: Product Detail Page: Remove anchor links from top right

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: would be part of redesign of detail page DISTRELEC-4482
Should be done along with DISTRELEC-4799, as anchors don't make much sense along with tabs.
done
Can be tested after next deployment.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4485] Product carousels able to display FF campaigns
item.description: Enable product carousels to be fed with FF campaigns to automate and facilitate all sorts of campaigns/recos, etc on all pages where content slots are available.
item.summary: Product carousels able to display FF campaigns

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Hi Flo, I checked this with Marc Kraft. He did not find any component apart from the carpet that could display a FF query. So no carousel for FF available at the moment. As I am basically only the messenger for this ticket (issued on behalf of Stef), I'd be glad if you could check with Marc directly.

I created a new component called Distrelec FACT-Finder Product Campaign Carousel that accepts a search query. The behavior of component rendering is the following:

  • When a page contains an instance of this component, a controller gets called.
  • Based on the introduced search query, the controller handles a search call to FACT-Finder.
  • Once the response received, the controller then process the data and renders the Carousel view.
@Sarah: I think the a.m. information is relevant for your team.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4390] Different language entry for our website in Switzerland
item.description:
In my search reports and from reports from customers I see that many people end up on the EN version of our web shop in Switzerland and start searching in their native languages (DE or FR), getting zero result pages.

I set up a campaign to at least inform people to switch languages, however, we need to find a solution that this does not happen as often as it does today, anymore. Either we can change the logic of language selection (default DE, even if EN browser settings & FR if FR settings) or/and by making the selection box more striking so that it is clear for the customer that they can select their own languages. The one we have today rather looks like a banner that is easily clicked away.

UPDATE: The flyout should disappear when the customer clicks on the blue area.
item.summary: Different language entry for our website in Switzerland

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi Daniela,
I would suggest the following variants:
1. We deactivate the automatically definition of the shop settings per customer.
2. We replace the shop settings bar from the bottom to the top.

I'll check out what is the best way.

New Mockup attached.
What do you think?
Looks good to me! Just a question: what does the "Einstellung ändern" stand for? Is it a link and if so, where to? If not, I'd remove the "distrelec schweiz" and put Einstellungen ändern:
okay, we'll remove "distrelec schweiz"

Hi Florian,

Should the "Distrelec Schweiz" be removed for all Webshops and also when the dialog is showed after the user clicks on the Settings Link at the top right corner of the page?

BR Jan

Hi Jan,
It is possible to remove it only on this dialog?
Please keep it on the settings that is requested by the customer at the right corner.

Please consider: there is an update on the description above.

Hi Florian,

Yes thats possible..I also adjusted the Description above to be different only the first time, the user sees the dialog.

Ticket will be done today eve. Could you point Nabil out, that we have another request on the pagination ticket?

Thanks BR JAn
.. But the update of the description will also only be on the initial Visit, right? After that, the description as it was until now will be shown!?
Yes correct.

ok..then the ticket is done and can be tested after next deployment.

BR Jan

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4342] Shopping Lists // Calculate total of all positions
item.description:
At the end of shoppping-lists the total of all positions should be calculated like in the cart. In that way the user knows how much his order will cost. This is important because in Cart there is no empty-all function.

  • The subtotal should contain the sum of the list prices or specific customer prices.
  • The calculation of the price scales should be added to the subtotal. If the scales will be changed a recalculate layer will appear (Screenshot 2)
  • Taxes only should be calculated if the customer is logged in as B2C customer (then we only need the "total" line)
  • B2C: 1 Line:
    • Subtotal
  • B2B: 1 Line:
    • Subtotal
  • Please rename the title "Ihr Warenkorb" into "Gesamtprice" (add the shopping list icon in front)
item.summary: Shopping Lists // Calculate total of all positions

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
All BE tasks are done for both cases Movex and SAP. Please assign to FE engineer.

URL to use for Ajax Calls:

/shopping/${shopping-list-id}/calculate

the received stream is of type JSON and has the form:

  • In Case of success: 
     {"error":"false","list-id":"a5743924-a4a6-4377-98d9-bc0969f13485","price":"866.05","currency":"CHF"}
  • In case of errors: 
    {"error":"true", "message":"Some articles in your shopping list are not buyable!"}

1. The problem of the Punchout/EOL is fixed
  2. At the beginning, the shopping list is not yet calculated, on the FE side, one should implement the callback to request for calculation and update the page.

Note: the backend implementation is complete.

Changes commited.
Please test after the next deployment
Thanks

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5277] Track 'empty cart'-functionality
item.description:
The new shopping-basket functionality 'empty cart' shall be amended according to the tracking-functionality specified at '8.2.1 Functional Elements' (compare https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/Webtrekk+-+Frontend+Implementation).

Required 'Activate Event ID': empty (> schemtic ID for .ch: ch.ons.empty.)

Thx Mark

status.description: This issue was once resolved, but the resolution was deemed incorrect. From here issues are either marked assigned or resolved.

comments.comment: Where can I test this implementation? Thx Mark
Please advise. Mark
Please advise where respectively how to test! Thx Mark
